item.title: Snippetty is on Product Hunt!
item.description: ðŸŽ‰ Snippetty’s being hunted. In a good way :) Snippetty is now on Product Hunt and I got pinged that it might get featured, so … this is great! I hear that Product Hunt gives product launches a nice big boost so I’d appreciate it a ton if you have a second ad upvote Snippetty on Product Hunt, thanks a lot! P.S. For all updates in real time follow: https://twitter.
